name: vralle-lazyload
description: Lazy loading images to speed up loading pages and reduce the load on the server. Images are loaded when they get to the screen. Uses lazysizes.js
author: vralle

scripts.copy-lazysizes: shx mkdir -p vendor/lazysizes/ && shx cp node_modules/lazysizes/*.js vendor/lazysizes/
scripts.copy-lazysizes-plugins: shx mkdir -p vendor/lazysizes/plugins/ && shx cp -r node_modules/lazysizes/plugins/ vendor/lazysizes/
scripts.copy-picturefill: shx mkdir -p vendor/picturefill/ && shx cp -r node_modules/picturefill/dist/ vendor/picturefill/
